data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Fu, Xinhua, Ballantyne, Lesley, Lambkin, Christine (2012): The external larval morphology of aquatic and terrestrial Luciolinae fireflies (Coleoptera: Lampyridae). Zootaxa 3405: 1-34, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.211302
